Interview Preparation: The Video
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
By now, you should be feeling pretty prepared for your Step Forward interviews. We've held a preparation event, sent you an email of our top tips and now it's time for Interview Preparation: The Video. This video is your number one guide on how to ace your interviews so click on the picture below, take some notes and enjoy!
Interview Preparation: The Video
Interviews will be happening over the next few months and we'll be in touch when you've been matched with your employers. Until then it's up to you to practise, practise, practise.
Good luck!
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
